name: Penguintale Izanso Fight
description:
Version 1.2.0

Press the green flag when you die to try again.

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move, Z or Space to select , X to go back and C to mute/unmute.

Undertale inspired battle, will you be able to beat it?

There's an unlockable impossible difficulty once you win the fight on hard mode.

The music piece used is called "Megaloglamour" I did not compose it or have any part in making it, Megaloglamour belongs to Nick Nitro:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClCzAESv7Lq_wAvqhbxa0LQ

This game was made on Scratch 3.25.0
